===Etymology===
{{Han etym}}
A simplification of the Buddhist symbol [[卍]] introduced when Buddhism came to China. [[卍]] was given the same pronunciation as [[萬]] meaning 萬[[德]] (many virtues); so, [[卍]] came to be used as a simplified form of [[萬]]. 万 is simply a scribal form (script) of [[卍]]. The meaning ''[[ten thousand]]'' for 万 is a borrowing.
